text: As you study the fragile map, your heart races. The markings hint at a hidden path leading to the artifact's resting place. A name scribbled in the corner catches your eye Professor Eldrin, a historian who once pursued the legend himself. What will you do?

options.text: Visit Professor Eldrin to learn more about the artifact and possible dangers.
Head straight into the Whispering Woods, trusting your instincts and the map.
